MSMGridPanel

This is the most important component.  Upload the store (RESTful request to GeoStore) in the grid.  The grid contains the plugin RowExpander that allows the display of buttons used to view, edit and delete resources saved within Geostore.

Inherits from

  • <Ext.grid.GridPanel>
Summary
MSMGridPanelThis is the most important component.
Properties and Functions
id{string} id of gridPanel
config{object} object for configuring the component.
border{boolean} If set to true, a border is drawn.
enableHDMenu{boolean} If set to true a menu is added to each column that allows the column sorting.
autoScroll{boolean} if set to true allows the appearance of the scrollbar if the content exceeds the size of the component
title{string} title to associate with the panel that contains the grid
msg{string} string to add in loading message
loadMask{object} to mask the grid while loading
murl{url} MapComposer URL
purl{url} rest/extjs/search URL
geoBaseUrl{url} rest/resources URL
purldel{url} rest/resources/resource URL
start{integer} start param for the first page load
limit{integer} limit param for the first page load
limit{integer} limit param for the first page load
textSearch{string} string to add SearchTool search button
tooltipSearch{string} string to add in SearchTool search tooltip
textReset{string} string to add in SearchTool reset button
tooltipReset{string} string to add in SearchTool reset tooltip
gridResourceId{string} title grid Resource Id
gridName{string} title grid Name
gridOwner{string} title grid Owner
gridDescription{string} title grid Description
gridDateCreation{string} title grid Date Creation
gridLastUpdate{string} title grid Last Update
errorTitle{string} title server error
errorMsg_500{string} message server error for 500 status code
errorMsg_501{string} message server error for 501 status code
errorMsg_404{string} message server error for 404 status code
errorMsg_408{string} message server error for 404 status code
textViewMap{string} string to add in ViewMap button
tooltipViewMap{string} string to add in ViewMap tooltip
textCopyMap{string} string to add in CopyMap button
tooltipCopyMap{string} string to add in CloneMap tooltip
textEditMap{string} string to add in EditMap button
tooltipEditMap{string} string to add in EditMap tooltip
textDeleteMap{string} string to add in DeleteMap button
tooltipDeleteMap{string} string to add in DeleteMap tooltip
textEditMetadata{string} string to add in EditMetadata button
tooltipEditMetadata{string} string to add in EditMetadata tooltip
textSubmitEditMetadata{string} string to add in EditMetadata button
tooltipSubmitEditMetadata{string} string to add in EditMetadata tooltip
metadataSaveSuccessTitle{string} string to add in metadataSaveSuccess
metadataSaveSuccessMsg{string} string to add in metadataSaveSuccess
metadataSaveFailString{string} string to add in metadataSaveFail
msgSaveAlertTitle{string} string to add in confirm Title message when user closes map without save
msgSaveAlertBody{string} string to add in confirm Body message when user closes map without save
msgDeleteMapTitle{string} string to add in confirm Title message when user deletes map
msgDeleteMapBody{string} string to add in confirm Body message when user deletes map
msgSuccessDeleteMapTitle{string} string to add in Success Title message when user deletes map
msgSuccessDeleteMapBody{string} string to add in Success Body message when user deletes map
msgFailureDeleteMapTitle{string} string to add in Failure Title message when user deletes map
msgFailureDeleteMapBody{string} string to add in Failure Body message when user deletes map
lang{string} sets application locale
ajaxHeader{object} inizialization of header without Authorization
langSelector{object} combo to select a locale parameter
initComponentInitializes the component
scope{object} set the scope
enableCaching{boolean} catch events of buttons
